title: Must not decrease Assigned User Count when unassigning a user and case role for a specific case if there was already a different case user role assignment
specs: Richard - who can create a case
Dil - who is to add and remove some case role assignment for a case
Olawale - with an active solicitor profile
is made from an authorised application, by Dil, with the Case ID of C1, User ID of Olawale, proper Case Role CR-2 and the Organisation ID of Olawale
